#summary Changelog for ZFDebug.
#labels Featured

==SVN==
 * New: Ability to disable ZFDebug by passing ZFDEBUG_DISABLE as GET/POST parameter
 * New: Works with HTML5
 * New: Database plugin support EXPLAIN on SELECT queries for MySQL adapters
 * Changed: Plugin icons moved to individual files
 * Changed: File plugin uses realpath on base_path
 * Changed: Memory plugin uses dispatchLoop time in delta memory usage
 * Changed: Time plugin displays dispatchLoop time next to $_SERVER['REQUEST_TIME']
 * Changed: Time plugin displays average time for current request only
 * Changed: Panel widened to 800px
 * Fixed: Time plugin checks if the session has been started before resetting, issue #32
 * Fixed: File plugin problem with similarly named libraries, issue #16
 * Fixed: Line breaks depend on doctype setting, issue #13

==1.5==
 * New: Rewritten with modular plugin structure
 * New: Time plugin shows average/min/max request time
 * New: Registry plugin with contents of Zend_Registry
 * New: Html plugin with basic HTML info and W3C validation
 * New: Memory plugin supports `mark()` method to calculate delta memory usage
 * New: File plugin shows total size of included files
 * New: Cache plugin with information on Zend_Cache and APC
 * New: Debug bar remembers visibility (collapsed state) between reloads
